Articles.Content:
No set names for them yet, but my test vehicles (On kerbin) are Pirax and Piran, lander and rover.

Only image (Currently)

Piran will be redesinged so the decoupler stays on Pirax. Stack separators just get stuck on Piran.

Status of the Lander-rover : Waiting for me to build the rocket

Edited August 4, 2013 by Sesni
